  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="3575" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="3575" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.98</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="7880">7,880</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="853"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Gypsy Water</b> by <b>Byredo</b> is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men. <b>Gypsy Water</b> was launched in 2008. Top notes are Juniper, Lemon, Bergamot and Pepper; middle notes are Pine needles, Incense and Orris Root; base notes are Vanilla, Sandalwood and Amber. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a                         <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">67</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Musk in drydown may not be pleasant for some
                </div>

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="3575"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.142.jpg" style="width: 4.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Juniper-142.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Juniper</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.204.jpg" style="width: 4rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pine-Tree-204.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pine needles</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.90728327058369; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.68.jpg" style="width: 3.35rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Incense-68.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Incense</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.101.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orris-Root-101.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Orris Root</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 4.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.77716431896851; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 2.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div></div>

community and you will be able to add your own reviews.</span></p></div></div></div><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369413" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369413" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emeliestar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.449280.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emeliestar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369413ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369413" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/449280">Emeliestar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 09:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im having a hard time describing the opening of this scent, its not as sweet as mojave ghost and has a hint of bitterness. <br />
<br />
The dry down is straight up bright wood, what I imagine cedar would smell like. Definitely unisex, imo almost leaning masculine. <br />
<br />
Completely gone after 4 hours, not worth the price tag.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2369413"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2369413#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2367663" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2367663" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="edenmb21"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239052"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="edenmb21" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Remember-Me-49435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Remember Me"title="Remember Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2367663ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2367663" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239052">edenmb21</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-01">12/01/24 19:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i am so confused by other people saying this has a 'clean' scent. the first time i put this on, i was surprised by how sweet it smelled to me. its lemony, but it has wood and vanilla that really come out on my skin. it's almost like a cleaner, non-gourmand lira on me. it does not last longer than 3 hours on me or project at all. i like it but not enough to pay for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2363793" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2363793" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sofiarubin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2338511"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2338511.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sofiarubin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2363793ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2363793" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2338511">sofiarubin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-28">11/28/24 03:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gypsy Water is pure sophistication in a bottlegorgeous, understated, and undeniably special. Its clean and crisp, yet warm and woody, striking a perfect balance between cozy and fresh. A true chameleon, this scent effortlessly transitions from the office to an elegant evening out, always present but never overpowering.<br />
<br />
Its unisex allure makes it universally appealing, though its soft subtlety may not command enough brightness for a signature scent. Still, its an irresistible choice for everyday wear. Addictive and enchanting, its no surprise this bottle emptied far too quickly, even if its longevity leaves you wanting more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2363793"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2363793#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2363412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2360232" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sh4no4h"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369884"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1369884.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sh4no4h" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Scarlet-Poppy-Intense-64551.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64551.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scarlet Poppy Intense"title="Scarlet Poppy Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2360232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2360232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369884">Sh4no4h</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-24">11/24/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Top 3 for life. A perfect woody, vanilla aromatic. What more could a girl ask for. Intoxicating. I hove it macerating for better performance and its so hard not to wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2360232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2360232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2359145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2359145" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ninacabina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2143876"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ninacabina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bare-Vanilla-Candied-89298.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89298.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bare Vanilla Candied"title="Bare Vanilla Candied"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2359145ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2359145" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2143876">Ninacabina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I might be crazy but I feel like the dry down, on me at least, reminds me of Saint by KVD</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2359145"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2359145#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2355077" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2355077" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Jazz-Club-20541.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20541.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jazz Club"title="Jazz Club"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2355077ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2355077" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-20">11/20/24 03:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautifully fresh and clean, with lots of juniper, lemon, and just the barest hint of pepper. Quickly becomes sweeter as the vanilla develops, taking on more of a lemon cream kinda vibe. Its a quiet, delicate scent, but too much so for my tastes - I can barely smell it at after 30 minutes unless my nose is pressed right against my wrist. Lovely, but just too subtle for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2355077"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2355077#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349932" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MalibuMermaid"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757701.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MalibuMermaid" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-83483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess"title="Goddess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757701">MalibuMermaid</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-15">11/15/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this fragrance. Theres something enchanting and mystical about it that evokes nature. I love the juniper and aromatic opening and I also love the creamy and smoky dry down both different scent experiences  but both beautiful. As a woman I find this to be feminine but not in your face feminine. A manly man can definitely pull this off confidently too. I think because it pulls a nature vibe and nature is neither feminine nor masculine. People complaining about the longevity sure its not a super strong frag but it does last a few hours for me which is enough. I dont think this is just a skin scent. Put enough on and it does project. I know this brand does not use heavy chemicals and that affects scent power. Personally I appreciate that, I want to be able to let my young children snuggle into my skin without worrying Im wearing a big bad chemical perfume bomb.  <br />
<br />
I also own Tocca Colette which is a very close dupe. The performance is about the same (so if youre wanting a stronger version of G Water you are out of luck). Silly analysis: while Colette makes me feel like a fairy, G Water makes me feel like a friendly witch. It has a slightly more mature depth to it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2349932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2349932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347453" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2208672">chelseaannett</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 06:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont get the point of this. I dont think anyone would smell this on you unless you literally doused yourself in it, which at its price point Im too scared to. And it disappears within a few hours. The only person who would smell this on you is someone youre having sex with within two hours of applying the perfume. Its an alright inoffensive smell but other brands capture the same vibe with better sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2347453"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2347453#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346974" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346974" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cats_eye"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/991427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.991427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cats_eye" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Musk-of-Flowers-15206.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15206.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musk of Flowers"title="Musk of Flowers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346974ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346974" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/991427">cats_eye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 18:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me of a reed diffuser "home fragrance" of some kind of sweet fancy lemon vanilla pine potpourri. It's not warm or round enough or something. It's hard to explain. It's pleasant but rather flat. This would make a nice shampoo scent actually but I find it boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2346974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2346974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="darkforestmags"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1170902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="darkforestmags" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DedCool/Milk-67819.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67819.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Milk"title="Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1170902">darkforestmags</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 11:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Woody perfection. <br />
<br />
The incense here is perfectly balanced. And that sandalwood.. It's a forest, but like make it gentle, aesthetic in the best way possible. The orris root adds the lightest floral touch. Spices in the background are exquisitely blended. <br />
<br />
Such an easy to wear fragrance. The lemon is a gorgeous accent in the opening. Calming without veering into aromatherapy or room fragrance territory. Theres an unexpected warmth here that contrasts beautifully with the cooling evergreens. It's balsamic at the base, almost mystical. <br />
<br />
Exciting, fresh, new.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2346521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2346521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344281" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Who'd care less about the cap if the juice is weak? What's the whole point in assessing bottles instead of the perfume?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2343608"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2343608#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341985" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="forestwitch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="forestwitch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341985ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341985" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314256">forestwitch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-08">11/08/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to be blown away by this so badly, but I feel like that wasn't exactly the case. She is nice but not what I expected -  on my skin she smelled super citrusy for the first few minutes, then dried down to something peppery and smoky and slightly fresh and sweet. If I really focus then I can smell the faintest bit of vanilla but it's barely there for me. From reading the reviews I think it smells quite different depending on the person, and for me I don't really pick up on the vanilla or incense. Tbh I feel like this actually smells more masculine leaning on my skin (not a bad thing). This is not to say I don't like this scent, as I actually quite enjoy the notes it does pull on my skin. You do need to give it time to develop after the initial spray as the citrus mostly disappears and leaves something wonderful in its place. Definitely a skin scent, its close and intimate. I agree with those saying its casual without being boring. <br />
<br />
Definitely more of an autumn/winter scent for me. Jeans and a sweater on a woodland walk. <br />
<br />
In my humble opinion I would say this isn't safe as a blind buy if you're not prepared for it to smell different on yourself than some people have described. Definitely test it out first. I will be wearing for the next few days to really give her a chance. She's still beautifully smoky and warm and complex, and I do like her. Maybe not enough to buy a whole bottle though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2341985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2341985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2340680" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2340680" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="specialfairygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1112296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="specialfairygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Aventus-for-Her-38497.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38497.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aventus for Her"title="Aventus for Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2340680ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2340680" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1112296">specialfairygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 05:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yum, this is just so good. At first it smells like a cleaning product and its kind of sugary and weird. But after when the cleaning product smell subsides (in a. couple of minutes) you are left with this addictive fresh and sweet clean scent with a twist. Definitely a surprise and a full bottle worthy creation. At the beginning I laughed what on earth is the appeal when it smells like a citrusy household cleaner, but hey I do see it now, one you need to give time to develop. One of the best perfumes I have smelt in a while. High on synthetics though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2340680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2340680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1026213">Scissorslizardspock</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-06">11/06/24 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wearing G Water today after a long break from it, there are always new samples to play with.  I am hit again by how nice this is, just easy, fresh (but not cleaning product fresh), unique, calming and lovely.  I know theres a great deal of lamentation about lasting power and projection, but I dont want it to be more potent.  I choose it on days when I want something close wearing.  Im on my second bottle and will probably always have one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2339932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2339932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339922" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; GW pulls very sweet and somewhat floral on my skin, so sadly I dont get the woody, fresh, balsamic I was hoping for. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687570">Toasty-shmoes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 13:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Longevity and strength after 1 year of macerating is muuuuch better. I really hope Byredo is working on a G. water absolu de parfum concentration like they did with Mojave Ghost.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2331718"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2331718#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2330341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tripokaridos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tripokaridos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809949">Tripokaridos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the opening but in the dry down it gives me some sweetness that reminds me lemon pie and it's not for me ...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2330341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2330341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326737" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326737" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejayne64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejayne64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326737ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326737" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 19:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've only sampled this in the bottle, but it isn't a standout from their line to me. I am actually surprised this is the one that sort of became mass loved. I didn't really have any reaction too it, because it wasn't bad at all, but it wasn't surprisingly good. Will re-visit.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2326737"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2326737#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320896" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320896" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinkapoppy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193167"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinkapoppy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320896ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320896" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2193167">pinkapoppy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I keep coming back to this. It has that fresh zesty opening that makes me think this will be a bright citrus scent but then dries down to a really beautiful and calming skin scent.<br />
<br />
From the notes you would expect this to be a very woody pine based fragrance, however the vanilla really comes through and has the most addictive blend between the sandalwood, the juniper and vanilla with some lemon in the background which adds an energy to it. If I didn't know the notes beforehand I would not have expected this scent; it's soft yet assertive, and has something mystical or mysterious about it while still being a refreshing, 'clean', close to skin scent.<br />
<br />
I can't speak on longevity as I've only tested it in store a few times, but it's definitely a fragrance that you can smell the idea of instead of it being blasted in your face - when you hug someone or wash your hands or move your hair. One thing I will mention is that I was comparing this to Santal 33 (as I wanted to order both samples), and although they seem to have a similar sort of vibe, they are definitely different enough to have both. If you like Santal 33, this is its aromatic, cool older sibling who gives infrequent but really good hugs.<br />
<br />
Definitely unisex but I see why people say it's a 'cool girl' fragrance! I would even argue this is an all year round scent and I will definitely be wearing it all day. Absolutely love it, I ordered a sample after trying in store for the 3rd time and I cannot wait.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2320896"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2320896#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2318038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Shes beautiful and alight and airy- I have to seriously over-spray for any kind of projection.  But beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2318038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2318038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309792" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suicidal_wizard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610786"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suicidal_wizard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309792ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309792" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); Certain perfume ingredients simply are incredibly short lived and only a heavy dose of synthetics could enhance that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="3575"comment_id="2309792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/Gypsy-Water-3575.html?ccid=2309792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309785" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
